snippet: Both current and prospective owners would be wise to read the co-op’s financial documents. Here are questions that can guide you in analyzing the statement.
abstract: Both current and prospective owners of New York City co-op apartments are well-advised to read their building’s financial statements; list of questions to guide potential buyers in analyzing the soundness of a prospective co-op investment.
lead_paragraph: Both current and prospective owners would be wise to read the co-op’s financial documents. Here are questions that can guide you in analyzing the statement.

headline.seo: Getting Started | That Riveting Co-op Financial Statement
